means: 狩猎时招呼猎犬的喊声
高呼，喊叫着追赶，高声招呼喊叫

sentence.Network_en: That in turn is related to halloo, a cry to urge on hunting dogs.
sentence.Network_cn: 而hallo则又与halloo有 联系, Halloo乃指敦促猎狗时的叫声,其历史又可上溯至1700年.

sentence.Network_en: Do not halloo till you are out of the wood.
sentence.Network_cn: 未走出森林之前先别欢呼.

sentence.Network_en: He gave a great halloo but no one heard him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他大声打了个招呼,但没有人听见.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: probably from the rare verb hallow 'pursue or urge on with shouts', from imitative Old French haloer

sentences.sentence: "he gave a great halloo but no one heard him"

means.word_mean: 2. shout `halloo', as when greeting someone or attracting attention
